page.title: 15The new Marina in Swansea
page.content: {The decline of the docks created a lot {of empty waste space.} When the foreshore development plan was started one of the ideas was to create a{yacht {marina}in the old South Dock basin. A lot of new building has taken place giving a very attractive area with the marina itself, new flats and most recently some new shops. The new flats are very popular and although expensive sold very quickly. {The council is encouraging people to {visit and use the marina by providing {the shops, amusements and restaurants. They also hope that yacht owners will use the marina. Last year the Welsh Boat Show was held in Swansea Marina for the first time.
